A '''potato slab''' is a potato variant of a [[wooden slab]], [[craft]]ed from its corresponding [[potato planks]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
A potato slab can be broken using anything, but [[axe]]s are the fastest.

{{Breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Slab|axe|hidecopper=1}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A3 = Potato Planks
|B3 = Potato Planks
|C3 = Potato Planks
|Output = Potato Slab,6
|type = Potatoes
|ignoreusage = 1
}}
